title: @fix_FSsphere
description: Tool for fixing errors in FreeSurfer spherical surfaces

sphere_file.title: Sphere File
sphere_file.description: SPHERE.asc is the sphere to be used

num_iterations.title: Number of Iterations
num_iterations.description: Number of local smoothing operations. Default is 3000

extent_lim.title: Extent Limit
extent_lim.description: Extent, in mm, by which troubled sections are fattened. Default is 6

project_first.title: Project First Flag
project_first.description: Project to a sphere, before smoothing. Default is 0
